entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
